mapper.select: select od_id,order_id,goods_id,quantity,details_price,details_status from order_details where order_id = #{order_id} and details_status="未付款"
select od_id,order_id,goods_id,quantity,details_price,details_status from order_details where od_id = #{od_id} and details_status="未付款"

select d.od_id,g.goods_img,g.price,d.quantity,g.goods_name, g.price*d.quantity as total from order_details d LEFT JOIN goods g ON d.goods_id = g.goods_id where d.order_id=#{order_id} and d.details_status="未付款"

select DISTINCT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.order_time, o.order_status, o.order_address, o.order_price from orders o left join order_details od on o.order_id = od.order_id where o.user_id = #{user_id} and od.details_status = "已收货" or od.details_status = "已完成" group by o.order_id desc
